292075.「えっ…… ウソでしょ？\n もしかして 嵐を呼ぶ魔物……！？:
W-what... seriously? The monster causing this
storm...?!

292076.「<pc>が 鎮めてくれたはずでは？\n どうして ここに……。:
Didn't <pc> calm them down?
Why are they here...?

292077.「おうおう あんたが 妖精の女王さまか。\n いやあ 祭りのジャマしちまったみた:
Oh, so you're the Fairy Queen, huh? Sorry
about the whole interrupting the festivities
thing.

292078.「こちとら そんなつもりは\n これっぽっちも なかったんだ。\n 安心してくれ:
It was never my intention to ruin anything.
I promise I ain't calling up anymore storms.

292079.<if_woman>「ちょっと この姉ちゃんに\n 渡しわすれたものが あってな:
I forgot to give something to my friend here.
I just came by to give it to 'em.

292080.「おうおう <pc>！\n この大嵐メダルを おめえに やろう。\n オレを ご:
Here, <pc>! I want you to take
this Storm Medal. It's thanks for cheering
me up!

292081.<pc>は タイフゥから\n大嵐メダルを 受け取り\nおまとめぶくろに 入れた！:
<pc> received the Storm Medal
and placed it in their currency bag!<se_nots System 7>

292082.「あの…… すみません。\n そうは言っても まだ 天気は\n 回復しないままの:
Well.... I apologize. That being said, it
looks like the weather still hasn't gotten
any better...

292083.「あー すまねえな。オレのキゲンは\n <pc>のおかげで よくなったんだが\n:
Oh, that's my bad. My temper is better now
thanks to <pc> here, but it's still
draggin' a bit.

292084.「何を隠そう 家族に 捨てられちまったんだ。\n それが ココロのキズに なって:
To tell the truth... my family left me behind.
It's hurt me pretty bad, and has been brewin'
inside me like a low-pressure storm...

292085.「……つい こないだのことだ。\n いつものように 昼寝してて ふと 起きたら\:
It happened just the other day... I was taking
my usual nap, and when I woke up, I
found a note from my wife.

292086.「あなたのことは あきらめます。\n 娘と私 ふたりきりで いきます……ってな。:
"I'm giving up on you. I'm taking our
daughter and leaving."
She left me all alone!

292087.「トーネェ～～～ ハリケェ～～～！\n 帰ってきてくれえ～～～！！: Tornay... Hurricay... Please come back to me!!

292088.「あらあら。聞きおぼえのある\n バカでかい声がすると 思ったら\n やっぱり:
Oh, dear... I thought I heard a loud,
boisterous voice, and it just so happened
to be yours.

292089.「その声……。もしや\n オレのかみさん…… トーネェか！？: That voice... it's my wife's... Tornay?!

292090.「はい そうですよ。ここに来たら\n 私たちも スライムになるかと 思ったんです:
Yes, it's me. We thought we'd turn into slimes
after coming here, but somehow we ended up
looking like humans.

292091.「……あの書き置きは なんだったんだ？\n オレを置いて 出ていったんじゃ……。:
So what was that note about, then...?
You left me all alone...

292092.「あなたも お祭りに 誘うつもりでしたが\n 何をしたって 起きないので あきら:
I planned on inviting you to the festival, but
you wouldn't wake up. So, I left you that note
and left with our daughter.

292093.「だよね～。とーちゃん なぐっても\n けっとばしても 起きなかったもんね～。:
That's right! I nudged and I kicked, but
you were asleep like a log!

292094.「そうか……。カンちがいだったのか。\n オレは 捨てられたわけじゃなかったんだ:
I see... I guess I was wrong. I wasn't left
behind after all...

292095.「はい そうですね。\n そのくらいで 捨ててしまうなら\n 最初から 夫婦にな:
Yes, that's correct. I wouldn't have married
you if I was prepared to throw it all away
for something so small.

292096.「だよね～。かーちゃんは とーちゃんのこと\n と～っても 好きだもんね～。:
That's right! Mommy loves you so much!
Isn't that right?

292097.「うおお～～～～ よかったぁ～～～～～！\n ヒトの姿も イカしてるぜ～～～っ。:
Roooar! How nice!! So cool, even as a human!!
That's my Tornay!!!

292098.「すごい！ 空が 晴れたわ！！: Wow! The sky finally cleared up!

292099.「ふうう～。低気圧を吹っとばして\n 一気に 高気圧を 呼んじまったなあ。:
Phew... looks like the low front blew away
and brought in the high front.

292100.「これも 愛のチカラ……なのでしょうか？\n ともあれ お祭りに ふさわしい\n:
Could this be the power of love...? At any
rate, the sky has finally become clear and
sunny once more... perfect for this festival.

292101.「<pc>の活躍が あればこそです。\n こちらに お礼を用意しましたので\n:
We are grateful for your help, <pc>.
I have prepared a reward for you. I hope that
you'll accept it.

292102.「……はああ。\n やっと お祭りが 始められるのね。\n 急いで 準備を 終わ:
Whew... so the festival can finally start.
We gotta hurry and finish preparing!

292103.「では 私たちも お祭りを\n 楽しませて いただくとします。: We'll all enjoy the festivities, too.

292105.「オレがいると うっかり 嵐を呼びやしないか\n みんな 不安に なっちまうよな:
I'm worried that me bein' here will cause
another storm... I think I'll just go sightsee
around Astoltia instead.

292106.「はい お好きに。\n 娘には 私が ついていますから。:
Yes, of course. Hurricay will stay here with
me.

292107.「ええと <pc>さんでしたね。\n すみませんが この後 私のところで\n お:
Um... it's <pc>, right? If you
have a minute, could you please speak with
me afterwards?

292108.「うちのヒトが ご迷惑をおかけしたので\n ちょっと フォローをしようかと 思い:
Since my husband caused you a bit of trouble,
I'd like to make it up to you somehow. Please
let me know if there's anything I can do.

292109.ベラの指揮のもと 祭りの準備が進められ\nついに 春の祭りが 始まった！:
Under Honey's leadership, preparations were
well underway. At long last, the Spring
Festival had begun!
